hero.title: Agentic Software Development
hero.subtitle: AI-Driven Development with Human Oversight
hero.description: We combine advanced AI agents with expert human guidance to deliver software faster, smarter, and more efficiently. Every project is orchestrated by Rommel, our Agent Master, ensuring quality and precision in every line of code.

introduction.title: The Future of Software Development
introduction.content: Agentic Software Development represents a fundamental shift in how software is built. By leveraging AI agents for routine tasks, code generation, and testing while maintaining human oversight for architecture, strategy, and critical decisions, we achieve unprecedented speed and quality. This approach allows us to deliver enterprise-grade solutions at a fraction of traditional costs and timelines.

featuredProducts.title: Sunny
featuredProducts.description: VSol's AI Agent that builds systems adapting to your process. Sunny handles everything from systems analysis to development, QA, and DevOps. The system learns how you work instead of forcing you to learn it.
features: Working MVP delivered in days, not months
Systems that adapt to your unique workflow

featuredProducts.title: Work Automation Platform
featuredProducts.description: Turn manual workflows—spreadsheets, task lists, calendars, and planners—into intelligent automated systems. Built with Sunny for rapid delivery and perfect customization.
features: AI-generated interactive mockups during discovery calls
Complete workflow documentation and ROI analysis

benefits.title: Accelerated Delivery
benefits.description: AI agents handle repetitive coding tasks, automated testing, and documentation generation, allowing us to deliver projects 3-5x faster than traditional development approaches.

benefits.title: Cost Efficiency
benefits.description: By automating routine development work, we reduce project costs by up to 70% while maintaining high code quality and comprehensive test coverage.

benefits.title: Consistent Quality
benefits.description: AI agents apply best practices uniformly across all code, ensuring consistent style, thorough documentation, and comprehensive error handling throughout your project.

benefits.title: Human Expertise
benefits.description: Every decision that matters is made by experienced developers. AI handles the mechanics; humans handle the strategy, architecture, and innovation.

items.title: AI-Accelerated Web Applications
items.description: Full-stack web applications built with AI assistance for frontend, backend, and database layers. We use AI agents for component generation, API development, and automated testing while maintaining human oversight for architecture and user experience design.

items.title: Legacy System Modernization
items.description: Transform outdated systems into modern, maintainable codebases. AI agents analyze legacy code, generate documentation, and assist in refactoring while human experts guide the modernization strategy and ensure business logic integrity.

items.title: Automated Testing & Quality Assurance
items.description: Comprehensive test suite generation and maintenance using AI. We create unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests automatically, with human validation of test coverage and critical paths.

items.title: API Development & Integration
items.description: Rapid API development with AI-generated endpoints, documentation, and client SDKs. Human experts design the API architecture and ensure security, scalability, and proper error handling.

items.title: Code Review & Optimization
items.description: AI-powered code analysis identifies performance bottlenecks, security vulnerabilities, and maintainability issues. Human experts provide strategic recommendations and implement optimizations.

items.title: Technical Documentation
items.description: Automated generation of API documentation, code comments, architecture diagrams, and user guides. AI handles the writing; humans ensure accuracy and clarity.

items.title: Sunny - Custom System Builder
items.description: Replace any CRM, ERP, or management system with automation built through natural conversation. Sunny is VSol's AI Agent who handles analysis, development, QA, and DevOps. From spreadsheet replacements to complete work automation platforms. Speech-to-text to working MVP in days.

agentMaster.name: Rommel
agentMaster.title: Agent Master
agentMaster.bio: Rommel founded VSol Software and has spent over 15 years architecting enterprise software solutions for global clients. As Agent Master, he orchestrates AI agents to handle development tasks while maintaining strategic oversight of every project. His expertise spans full-stack development, cloud architecture, and agile methodologies, ensuring that AI acceleration never comes at the cost of quality or maintainability.
agentMaster.quote: AI agents are remarkable tools, but software development is still fundamentally a human endeavor. My role is to ensure that we harness AI's speed and consistency while applying human judgment where it matters most.

cta.title: Ready to Accelerate Your Development?
cta.description: Discover how Agentic Software Development can transform your next project. Get faster delivery, lower costs, and higher quality.
